name: campus-security-system
description: Campus Entity Resolution & Security Monitoring System for Ethos Hackathon

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:ml"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Campus Security Team
